sentences.en: Each period had its own particular style of architectural decoration.
sentences.cn: 每个时期都有其建筑装饰上的风格.

sentences.en: Exquisite exquisite architectural design high and low around the patchwork, imaginative.
sentences.cn: 建筑设计玲珑精巧,高低前后错落有致, 匠心独运.

sentences.en: He constructed his house with an eye to architectural beauty.
sentences.cn: 他在建造房屋时着眼于建筑之美.

sentences.en: He found himself staring at an extraordinary architectural confection of old and new.
sentences.cn: 他发现自己盯着一座新旧结合的建筑精品看出了神。

sentences.en: He's an architectural draftsman in the office where I work.
sentences.cn: 他是位建筑制图员,和我同办公室工作.

sentences.en: It is a temple of rare architectural beauty.
sentences.cn: 论建筑之美,那是一座极少有的寺院.

sentences.en: Majored in Architect, Construction Management and Architectural Economy & Enterprise Management are preferred.
sentences.cn: 建筑学 、 建筑工程管理、建筑经济管理毕业者优先.

sentences.en: The architectural and environmental psychology is a part of the environment psychology.
sentences.cn: 建筑环境心理学是环境心理学的一部分.

sentences.en: The architectural form consists of weighted properties and relationships.
sentences.cn: 架构形式由可度量的属性和关系组成.

sentences.en: The architectural structure of the Temple of Heaven is unique.
sentences.cn: 天坛的建筑结构很别致.

sentences.en: The architectural style usually referred to as High Tech was also emerging.
sentences.cn: 建筑风格通常设计高科技也显现出来.

sentences.en: The garden has an informal feel to soften the architectural lines of the conservatory.
sentences.cn: 花园有一种随意的风格，从而使温室的建筑轮廓显得柔和了。

sentences.en: The new architectural model was dubbed " the monster house. "
sentences.cn: 这种新式建筑被称为 “ 怪物屋. ”

sentences.en: The palace is a complete hotch-potch of architectural styles.
sentences.cn: 这座宫殿完全是各种建筑风格的大杂烩。

sentences.en: You can also take in some of the notable architectural monuments.
sentences.cn: 你也可以将一些著名的纪念性建筑包括在参观的项目中.

words.tran_cn: 建筑术的；组织的；知识体系的
建筑学；建筑风格；建筑式样

phrases.tran_cn: 建筑图则；建筑绘画；建筑制图；建筑绘图

trans.tran_cn: 建筑学的，建筑上的，有关建筑的，符合建筑法的
trans.tran_en: Architectural means relating to the design and construction of buildings
